name: 5 o'clock on a Friday
description:
A game about trying to get home for the week-end in Friday's traffic.

Made by a solo developer.

Art:

  • All the 3D arts and animations are made for the jam, except for the background props (from a Synty Studios pack);
  • Sounds & Music are free (CC0) sounds with some modifications, either from freesound.org or personal resources;

Coding:

  • Everything from scratch;
